snippet: A photo of a woman accused of running a brothel and a man identified as a bodyguard sent a shiver of recognition through the ranks of law enforcement.
abstract: A photo of a woman accused of running a brothel and a man identified as a bodyguard sent a shiver of recognition through the ranks of law enforcement.

byline.original: By AL BAKER and WILLIAM K. RASHBAUM

headline.main: For Woman Charged as Madam, Unusual Tie to Law Enforcement
